comment: DO NOT TAKE if you are a working student. SO MANY ARTICLES, and the assignments are tedious! The assignments are PASS/FAIL! On Week 3, and already thinking of withdrawing. If you can - TAKE ANOTHER professor
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Class is super easy, just make sure you read the syllabus and understand what needs to get done. Also do your PREX early so you don't have to work about it later. Just do the work. Easy A

Dr. Allen is a great professor with a laid-back approach to teaching, making his class easy to follow and manage. The assignments are consistent each week, revolving around similar tasks. He is also very approachable, always willing to answer questions and provide guidance when needed.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: If you want a laid-back, easy, yet interesting class, take Dr. Allen. All of your assignments are done online and his lectures are interesting. The assignments can be a bit tiresome, but you will pass if you use your resources.
Very easy class there is a quiz and reflection every week but their online so easy A honestly .
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: Each week there is a quiz due not hard at all. The only issue with this teacher is that he does not respond to the emails. Multiple students have been complaining about him not emailing us back which is really bad.
great professor and each assignment is online so its an easy A.

The class was super hard but only because it is a statistics class. He cares about his students and is willing to change his teaching style if needed. Probably one of the best statistics teachers out there.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Great Professor, He checks on his students every class by providing a poll. Lectures occur during class. Weekly Quizzes online. You have an assignment every other fourth week. No final

Dr. Allen is one of the best professors I have ever had! He is so caring and answers any and all questions without making you feel incompetent. He is the most interactive professor I have had at KSU. He really wants his students to excel in his class as well as outside. He offers resubmissions that don't effect your grade. He's wonderful take him!

Dr. Allen is by far one of the best professors ive had in my four years at KSU. His assignments arent incredibly tough and he allows resubmissions of assignments you do poorly on. His feedback is very clear so you know exactly what to fix. He has been amazing even through online learning so i would highly recommend taking him when you can!

Didn't really teach at all. Asynchronous online, and we just read the textbook and did the weekly assignments (either a long paper or a 4-6 minute voice assignment). Weird pass/fail grading system for each assignment but you just have to pass a certain number of the assignments to get an A, and they're all based on a very clear rubric.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--So many papers

comment: We don't take any quizzes or tests. Instead every week we have to read an article and either write a CREATE (7 page analysis but he gives you a very thorough guideline), or create a 5 minute voice thread about the article. That is it. He is very caring. If you get behind he will let you turn in things late. Recommend.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: Knew I needed to drop this class after just two days. Mind you I received all A's last semester and current GPA is a 3.56. Work load was equivalent to masters/phd level program. Hsd us using Khan Academy, text book, D2L, and one other application. Just way too much if you have a full course load. Nice guy, just waaayy too much to juggle.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Straight to the point and very nice

Dr. Allen was one of my favorite professors at KSU! Super knowledgable, the class is very interesting and he keeps it fun. The grading strategy he uses is also very helpful! This is one of the only classes that I actually enjoyed going to. He's awesome, take him!!

Dr. Allen is a gem. I had him last semester he had a TA as well, she was helpful. They both were sweet and understanding. I definitely would take his class again. Go to class. Do the work. Youll pass.

Professor Allen is a great person but a very picky professor. I do not recommend his class to those who do not do well in analyzing journal articles and writing about them at least three times to make an A. IF psychology is your major then this a great class for you but if not then be prepared to work hard to make an A.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Took him for Forensic Psych, hardest part about the class is the Article Analysis but you get a chance to resubmit what you didn't do well on. He tells you what you need to do to make a certain grade in his class. Overall I enjoyed it. Good class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Tough grader

comment: Dr. Allen was a really great professor to learn from. He knows the information he teaches very well. He is clear and open with students about his expectations and makes it a point to be accessible. He gives you a blueprint of how to achieve the grade you want. He is understanding and always willing to admit to and correct his own mistakes.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring
